Body:
l = TemplateLookup()
l.put_string('index',
    """
                <%inherit file="base"/>
                <%block name="title">
                    index title
                </%block>

                <%block name="header">
                    index header
                    ${parent.header()}
                </%block>
            """
    )
l.put_string('base',
    """
            above
            <%block name="header">
                base header
                <%block name="title">
                    the title
                </%block>
            </%block>

            ${next.body()}
            below
        """
    )
self._do_test(l.get_template('index'), ['above', 'index header',
    'base header', 'index title', 'below'], filters=result_lines)
